metadata.name: The Merge
metadata.description: The Merge is an AI infused animated artwork inspired by spiritual experiences and growth over several years and showcases the journey of life from beginning to end to another new beginning as a continuous, eternal cycle. Download the Artivive app on your Android or IOS device to continue experiencing this wonderful journey in AR mode using the final artwork shared at the end of the animation. Music created and sang a cappella by Vasuvian himself.
